Title: Attouteki Vivid Days
Description: ["Official music video for Nanami Yoshi.'s song ", Attouteki Vivid Days, '. Nanami is a virtual idol whose song was also used as the ED to ', Kenja no Mago, ". A version with watermarks was posted to Avex Entertainment's official YouTube channel on May 17, 2019; it was stated to be the full-length music video. This was meant to advertise her CD+DVD going sale of the same name on June 19, 2019. The accompanying DVD will feature a clean version of the music video."]
